title: ex2D
description:
ex2D is a highly integrated 2D-sprite-related development extension for Unity. It aims at providing high performance 2D sprite/UI solution inside Unity, with a specific focus on creating tons of cutting-edge sprite animations and other content in complicated Unity scenes, while still maintaining great performance on mobile devices.

changes:
* New Features
  * Add Stop Animation Action in SpriteAnimation Clip
  * Remove Rebuild button from Inspector, instead add it in the Context Menu
  * Add shear to ease user create Character Shadow 2D Shear
  * Add exSoftClip Component to handling software rect clip help user built their GUI system
  * Add Use Animation Helper in exPlane and derived classes
  * Add exAnimationHelper, exSpriteBaseAnimHelper, exSpriteAnimHelper, exSpriteFontAnimHelper component
  * Add Soft-Clip, easy for user doing GUI
* Changes
  * Hide the mesh drawing on selected Sprites, instead use rectangle draw it
  * Let exSprite Inherit from exPlane
  * Move plane, anchor, width, height properties to exPlane
  * Adjust the layout of Inspector for sprite classes
  * Move functions from exAtlasEditor to exAtlasInfo so user can create there script driven working pipeline
  * Add AddAnimation, RemoveAnimation in exSpriteAnimation, this help user dynamically add animation when running the game.
  * Performance improvements for the first time cache AtlasDB and SpriteAnimationDB
  * Add exSpriteAnimation::Play( name, index ), play start from frame i
  * Add exSpriteAnimation::SetFrame( name, index ), set the sprite to frame i
* Bug Fixes
  * Fix the memory increase fast
  * Fix exViewportPosition, exScreenPosition not update in the scene when adjust the value.
  * Fix Atlas removes not update AtlasDB
  * Fix SpriteAnimationClip removes not update SpriteAnimationDB
